mapper.insert: insert into SCD_DIV_TB (bs_scd_sq, scd_sq, stf_sq, bs_bs_nm, bs_bs_scd_cnt, bs_scd_str_dt, bs_scd_end_dt) values (BS_SCD_TB_BS_SCD_SQ.nextval, #{scd_sq}, #{stf_sq}, #{bs_bs_nm}, #{bs_bs_scd_cnt}, to_date(#{bs_scd_str_dt}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mi:ss'), to_date(#{bs_scd_end_dt}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mi:ss'))
